question: 粘着
sourceMnemonic: If something <kanji>sticky</kanji> <kanji>wears</kanji> something else on it, it will stick together and form a <vocabulary>cohesion</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>adhesion</vocabulary> onto that thing. It's sticky after all.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
